title: PM announces Hilal-e-Imtiaz posthumously for Sher Alam Mahsud
content:
ISLAMABAD, Jan 20 (APP): Prime Minister Shehbaz Sharif on Friday announced the conferment of Hilal-e-Imtiaz (civil) posthumously on Secretary Kashmir Affairs late Captain (Retd) Sher Alam Mehsud.
The prime minister announced the national award for the late federal secretary in recognition of his remarkable public services.
Sher Alam Mehsud passed away due to cardiac arrest during service.
